Literature.Title: Gageotetrins A-C, noncytotoxic antimicrobial linear lipopeptides from a marine bacterium Bacillus subtilis.
Literature.Author: Tareq FS, Lee MA, Lee HS, Lee YJ, Lee JS, Hasan CM, Islam MT, Shin HJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=0.03µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=0.03µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=0.06µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=0.06µM),Rhizoctonia solani(MIC=0.06µM),Colletotrichum acutatum(MIC=0.03µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=0.03µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(no activity data),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT-15(no activity data),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(no activity data),Human lung adenocarcinoma NCI-H23(no activity data),Human gastric cancer NUGC-3(no activity data),Human renal adenocarcinoma ACHN(no activity data)
